column2: The AIand Digital Officer will be the second-in-command to the visionary CAIDO andplay a crucial role in leading AI and digital transformation initiatives withinkey ministries.                  The primary focus of this role will be to modernize theMinistrys technology infrastructure, enhance its online presence, drive theadoption of new technologies, and improve the overall user experience.                  The AIand Digital Officer will provide technical leadership, create and own theDigital Transformation Roadmap, and steer the technology architecture for theconcerned Ministry.                              This strategic role will be responsible for driving thedigital transformation efforts of the Ministry as a whole, ensuring seamlesscoordination, and leveraging the potential of AI and emerging technologies.                                  Key Responsibilities:                                            a.              StrategicAdvisory:        Provide expert advice to Secretary of the Ministry on digitaltransformation, assisting in the development and execution of strategiesrelated to data and technology. Aid in prioritizing technology programs andgovernment spend to chart a clear direction for digital transformation.                  b.              Leadershipand Coordination:        Offer professional leadership and support tothe Ministry and its departments to present an integrated view of citizenservice delivery. Drive intra and inter-ministerial coordination and synergyconcerning technology matters.                  c. Foster the use of AI andemerging technologies to deliver commitments in coordination with relevantstakeholders.                  e.              GovernmentCollaboration:        Facilitate CAIDO in AI and technology matters and assist theMinistry in meetings and collaborations with other government entities,industry partners, and stakeholders.                  f.              Shared Digital Services:        Collaborate with other departments and agencies to identify opportunities forshared digital services, ensuring interoperability and compatibility of digitalsystems.                                      DesiredSkills/ Competencies                            i.              Educational Background:        Bachelors or Masters degree in computer science, information systems, or arelated field.                        ii.              Experience:        Minimum of 15 years of overallexperience, with at least 10 years in leading digital transformation and/or AIinitiatives, delivering complex projects within timelines and budget.                        iii.              Digital Transformation Experience:        Provenexperience in ideating, developing, and implementing major digitaltransformation projects for industry and/or government.                        iv.              AI Knowledge:        In-depthknowledge of state-of-the-art AI technologies and applications.                        v.              Data Security and Compliance:        Strongunderstanding of security protocols for digital and AI systems to ensure dataprivacy and integrity, achieving 100% compliance with industry best practicesand standards.                        vi.              Consulting and SI Experience:        Experience working for consulting and system integration companies, providingproject management and digital transformation services for Government of Indiaand State Governments.                        vii.              Passion for AI-Powered Transformation:        Enthusiasm for driving change in Government through AI-powered digitaltransformation platforms and programs on a national scale.                        viii.              Leadership and Energy:        Highenergy and a strong sense of urgency to drive transformative initiatives.                        ix.              Communication and Collaboration:        Excellentleadership, communication, and collaboration skills, with the ability to workeffectively with diverse stakeholders.                                      KPIs:                      1.              DigitalTransformation Progress:        Measure theprogress of digital transformation initiatives within the Ministry, assessingthe number of projects completed, their impact, and the overall advancementtoward digitalization goals.                  2.              AI AdoptionRate:        Track the adoption rate of AItechnologies and solutions within the Ministry, evaluating the extent to whichAI is integrated into various processes and services.                  3.              AI ProjectSuccess Rate:        Track thesuccess rate of AI projects, including successful implementation, meetingobjectives, and delivering business value.                 4.              StakeholderFeedback:        Gatherfeedback from stakeholders, including Minister, Secretary, and other relevantpersonnel, on the effectiveness and impact of digital transformationinitiatives.                  5.              ProjectTimelines:        Measure thetimely completion of digital transformation projects and AI initiatives,comparing actual timelines with planned schedules.

column2: Intellistride is looking for a solution consultant to support IoT business in INDIA/APAC market. Intellistride aims to provide end to end IoT Solutions to enterprises in the region. Solution Consultant - IoT will have the responsibility of designing and project managing solutions for Customers in INDIA region. Key priorities of the role will be as follows:       Design IoT Solutions    based on Customer needs. The Solution consultant works across Intellistride and non Intellistride IoT RFID product and services landscape and designs specialized solutions for the Customer requirement. The Solution could incorporate 3rd Party products and devices which can be integrated onto Intellistride Cross talk IoT platform.       Understanding Customer Business needs   : The position requires the person to understand current Customer processes and Business needs. The designed solution should demonstrate considerable business improvement on financials and process efficiencies.       Documentation and Presentation to Customers   : The position requires the person to support the Sales team in Customer interface with presentation and Customer Solutions documentation. The Solutions documentations would be uploaded in a central repository to be accessed across Intellistride globally. The Solution consultant will be a single point of contact for all technical clarifications related to the Solution both during the presales and Execution phase.       Project Management of projects   : The position will also require the Solution consultant to lead some early projects in a country during the execution phase.       Leading/ Supporting POC/ Demo   : The position will require supporting specific customer demo of Intellistride Products and running of Proof of Concept (POC) for solutions. The success criteria for the POC will need to be defined with the Customer. Solution consultant will need to lead the technical changes that need to be done to make the POC a success.       Interactions with Regional Solutions Team and Global Development team:    Solutions consultant role will be responsible for working closely with Regional Solution Constant team in Bangalore India. The solution consultant will be a member of this regional team for all technical development and Solution discussions. The solution consultant in the country is also expected to be working and providing inputs into global Developments of IoT Products.       Creation of White papers and Use case Studies   : Solution consultant from time to time will be required to work with the strategy team to create white papers and Use case study documents as Customer collaterals.       Value based templates and      tools:    In initial phases of the job Solution consultant is expected to create a Value based selling template and tools to provide a standardized way of creating customer value of solutions. This tool in long run will be used to provide a regular value-based argument for each and every designed solution.       Partnerships and Vendor management and local testing   : Intellistride philosophy is to incorporate devices from third party vendors onto the readers and Crosstalk software. This will require the solution consultant to do local testing of tags, sensors and other devices and qualifying the quality of tags and devices including interworking with Intellistride platform.       Candidate requirements   :       7-10 years of Strong solutioning background in IoT/ RFID/ Software.         Good English speaking/ written communication absolutely critical as the candidate will be dealing with international customers and internal team.         Good understanding of IoT Value chain, System Integration and Software Sales concepts.         Exposure in execution phase of projects a must for a rounded experience         Deep HW SW technical and execution background in RFID, Sensors IoT Platform domain.         Good understanding of Customer Sales engagement process is essential.         Experience on large complex IoT projects will be a added advantage.         Additional business economics experience advantageous.         Good market/ Competitive/ Partner knowledge in IoT space.         Open and free mind to determine and create solutions (technical creative person)         Hands-on mentality         Good office skills (PowerPoint, Excel, ). Understanding of Crosstalk Software will be an advantage         Experience in creating presentations and training schemes         Preparedness to travel (region INDIA/APAC)

column2: As an IoT Architect, you will be responsible for leading the technical architecture, development, implementation, and deployment of IoT solutions.      You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, manage resources, and drive innovation to create low-latency, scalability, high availability, performant, robust, and scalable IoT architectures.      Your role involves guiding the team through the entire project lifecycle, from conceptualization and design to testing, deployment, and maintenance.       Key Responsibilities:       Strategic Planning: Develop IoT strategies aligned with business objectives. Assess technical requirements and     design solutions that meet scalability, security, and performance needs.     Team Leadership: Lead a team of IoT engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and technical expertise.     Manage resources effectively to ensure project timelines and deliverables are met.     Architecture Design: Design and architect IoT solutions, considering device connectivity, data management,     cloud infrastructure, security protocols, and interoperability.     Prototyping and Development: Oversee the development of IoT prototypes and proofs of concept. Drive the     development process, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards.     Technology Evaluation: Stay updated with emerging IoT technologies, tools, and platforms. Evaluate and     recommend technologies that enhance IoT capabilities and efficiency.     Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams (software developers, hardware engineers, data     scientists, etc.) to integrate IoT solutions into existing systems and applications.     Security and Compliance: Implement robust security measures and compliance standards to protect IoT     systems and data. Ensure adherence to regulatory requirements.     Testing and Deployment: Plan and execute rigorous testing procedures to validate     IoT solutions. Oversee deployment strategies and provide support during the deployment phase.     Documentation and Reporting: Create comprehensive documentation including technical specifications, user     guides, and reports. Communicate project progress and outcomes to stakeholders.       Skills and Qualifications:       Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field     Proven experience of 12-14 years in IoT development and implementation.     Proficiency in IoT protocols, such as Modbus, MQTT, CoAP, NAT, UPC, and HTTP/S.     Strong programming skills in languages like Java, and Python. Proficiency in C, and C++ is a plus.     Knowledge of frontend technologies like Angularjs, React js, etc is a plus.     Strong Experience with any one open-source IoT platform such as Thingsboard,     Open Remote, Node-Red, Kinoma, DSA, or Thinger. Additional experience with AWS IoT and Azure IoT can be a plus but not mandatory.     Strong Experience in KAFKA, Redis, MQ, Kubernetes, Spring Boot, Cassandra,PostgreSQL is mandatory     Strong Experience in Data lake and ETL tools     Strong Experience in cross-compilation and Embedded Linux OS     Strong Knowledge of edge computing, sensor technologies, GSM, and wireless communication.     Understanding of cybersecurity principles in IoT.     Excellent leadership, communication, and team management skills.     Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work in a fast-paced environment.       Preferred Qualifications:       Certifications in IoT-related fields (e.g., Certified IoT Professional).     Experience with AI/ML integration in IoT solutions.     Familiarity with DevOps practices for IoT deployments.       Qualifications skills Required        Designing     IOT     Solutioning

column2: We need a professional with:   Deep passionate about technology and keeping the systems and your knowledge updated. Eagerness to work in a fast-paced dynamic environment for a quickly growing company. One who is looking for high visibility and unlimited growth potential. Willing to learn and work on additional technologies and platforms. Strong agile skills and a penchant for technology Specifically. This role will involve: Confirm project requirements by reviewing Product objective, input data, and output  requirements with Engineering Manager, Product Manager, and client.  Prioritize project requirements in programming sequence within full SDLC in Agile Scrum method. Collaborate with Product Management to understand the acceptance criteria and with QA to do  test-driven development. Create solutions architecture, algorithms, and designs for solutions that scale to the customer's  enterprise/global requirements.  Do elegant programming which should be solving the problem and has decent performance,  succinct, simple, easy to understand, modular, reusable and maintainable. Use coding standards and guidelines and standardize the code with effective use of advanced  algorithms, design patterns, and development frameworks. Do the required unit testing and effectively monitor quality throughout the implementation. Develop a thorough and deep understanding of the Product Business Logic up to the SME level. Engage sophisticated global customers in deep technical discussions, making them confident that  you know their problem better than they do. Maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, continue  education by reading articles, publications and attending user groups. Essential experience and skills:   6+ years of experience as a developer/Sr developer   Problem-Solving: The ability to approach complex problems systematically and come up with  effective solutions.  Communication: Clear communication skills for explaining complex technical concepts to non technical stakeholders and collaborating with global team members.  Teamwork: Ability to work in interdisciplinary teams comprising machine learning engineers,  data scientists, software developers, and possibly domain experts.   Critical Thinking: Capacity to critique existing methods and theories and propose improvements  or alternatives.  Ethical Awareness: Given that GPT and similar technologies can have far-reaching societal  impacts, an understanding of the ethical implications is important. Adaptability: Machine learning and NLP are rapidly evolving fields, so a willingness to learn and  adapt to new methods and technologies is crucial.  Attention to Detail: With machine learning models, small changes can sometimes have big  impacts, so careful attention to detail is critical.  Technical skills:   Machine Learning Algorithms: Understanding of machine learning algorithms, especially deep  learning models like Transformers, is crucial. This can include various types of neural networks,  optimization techniques, and loss functions.  Natural Language Processing (NLP): Knowledge of NLP techniques, text representation methods,  and language models.  Programming Languages: Proficiency in languages commonly used in machine learning such as  Python/Java/Node.  Library/Framework Proficiency: Familiarity with machine learning libraries like TensorFlow,  PyTorch, or JAX.  High-Performance Computing: Understanding of parallel computing, GPU acceleration, and  distributed systems for training large models.  Data Manipulation and Analysis: Skills in data preprocessing, transformation, and analysis are  crucial, often involving libraries like Pandas, NumPy, or specialized tools for handling large  datasets.  DevOps and Infrastructure: Knowing how to set up and maintain machine learning pipelines,  from data collection to model training to inference, possibly using cloud platforms like AWS,  GCP, or Azure.  Optimization: Understanding of both algorithmic and hardware optimization techniques to  make training and inference more efficient.  Version Control: Proficiency with version control systems like Git to manage codebase changes.
column11: Data Science, Natural Language Processing, Java, Node, AWS, Python

column2: This role involves developing, testing, and maintaining system services and software applications optimized for edge computing devices. You will work closely with computer vision engineers to provide performant, secure, and scalable edge computing solutions for a wide range of AI applications.                Key Responsibilities             Architect, develop, test, and debug software for edge devices, ensuring high performance and reliability.           Support the development of our OS and docker containers for edge computing devices across IoT and server-class hardware platforms and software stacks.           Collaborate with computer vision engineers to provide performant, robust, and secure edge computing solutions for AI applications.           Explore and develop new methods for improving deep learning performance and the runtime of inference on edge devices.           Design, integrate, and maintain tools for reliable system health monitoring.           Conduct code reviews and suggest improvements for development and processes.           Ensure compliance with security and regulatory standards. Excellent Python programming skills with a strong background in APIs and networking (TCP/IP, DHCP, HTTP/REST). Expertise in container optimization and management and IoT protocols, especially MQTT.           Experience with graphics stacks Nvidia GPU and CUDA for AI / Computer vision use cases.           Knowledge of security best practices in IoT or server environments.           Experience working with open source communities and licenses. column2: The System Architect is an individual with a passion for designing and architecting complex systems in a cloud environment and posses strong leadership and technical skills. In this role, you will play a crucial part in shaping the architecture of our systems, ensuring their scalability, reliability, and efficiency. Collaborating closely with stakeholders, you will analyse requirements, design comprehensive system architectures, and define data models and flows. Additionally, you will lead efforts in implementing robust security measures and optimizing system performance.               We welcome candidates from    Chandigarh and Bangalore    to complement our existing teams.                   What Youll Be Responsible For:                     Collaborate with stakeholders to analyse requirements for new systems and enhancements.         Design comprehensive system architectures, identifying components, modules, and their interactions.         Given the architecture strategy related to our big data, analytics and cloud native product vision, work on the concrete architecture design and when necessary, prototype it         Define data architecture, including data models, databases, and data flows.         Architect the underlying infrastructure, encompassing servers, networks, and databases.         Design Databases, APIs, and communication protocols for system components.         Implement robust security measures to safeguard systems against cyber threats.         Optimize systems for performance, scalability, reliability, and efficiency.         Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams.         Drive data modeling, ETL processes, and data warehousing concepts.         Integrate cybersecurity principles and best practices into system design.                     Basic Qualifications:                     6-10 years of experience as a hands-on data or software engineer.         5+ years of experience in leading the system design and architecture of large-scale systems.         Proficiency in programming languages such as    Java, Python, Ruby, or Go.           In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in architecting and optimising large-scale database clusters, specifically MySQL and PostgreSQL, for    performance, scalability, and reliability.           Proficiency in    microservices architecture and containerization technologies    (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).                 Experience with designing and architecting complex systems in a cloud environment (AWS, Azure, GCP).         Knowledge of tenant data segregation techniques, such as schema-based multi-tenancy, database-per-tenant, and hybrid approaches, for ensuring data isolation and privacy.         Expertise in database design, including SQL and NoSQL databases,      with a specific focus on MySQL and PostgreSQL         Knowledge of networking protocols, security standards, and best practices.         Excellent communication and collaboration skills.                     Technical Requirements:                     Proficiency in infrastructure as code tools such as Terraform or AWS CloudFormation.         Experience with containerisation technologies such as Docker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.         Proficiency in implementing advanced replication topologies, such as master-slave replication, multi-master replication, and synchronous replication, for MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.         Knowledge of database partitioning techniques, such as range partitioning, hash partitioning, and list partitioning, for optimising storage and query performance in large-scale database clusters.         Familiarity with high availability architectures, such as active-passive and active-active configurations, for ensuring continuous availability and reliability of MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.         Familiarity with microservices architecture and related tools such as Istio, Envoy, or Linkerd.         Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and related tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or CircleCI.         Experience with monitoring and observability tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), or Splunk.         Familiarity with configuration management tools like Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.         Proficiency in version control systems such as Git.         Knowledge of scripting languages such as Bash, PowerShell, Ruby, or Python for automation tasks.         Understanding of cloud-native security practices and tools such as Google Identity and Access Management (IAM), AWS Key Management Service (KMS), or Azure Active Directory.         Familiarity with network security concepts such as VPNs, firewalls, and intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS).                     Preferred Qualifications:                     Bachelor s or above in computer science, Information Systems or Engineering    from top ranked colleges.           Experience with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code).         Proficiency in implementing advanced indexing strategies, query optimisation techniques, and database tuning methodologies for optimising the performance of MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.         Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools for system performance analysis.         Experience with distributed systems and message queuing systems (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ).         Proficiency in designing and implementing RESTful APIs.                       What Youll Bring to Maropost:                     Experience in deploying, managing, and fine-tuning large-scale database clusters, specifically MySQL and PostgreSQL, in self-managed environments.         Adaptability to changing requirements and priorities in a dynamic environment.         Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.         Understanding of agile development methodologies and tools such as Scrum, Kanban, or Agile Project Management software.         Understanding of performance isolation techniques for multi-tenant applications, including resource throttling, workload prioritisation, and tenant-specific caching strategies, to prevent noisy neighbor effects.         Extensive experience in designing, implementing, and optimising multi-tenant architectures for applications, ensuring efficient resource utilisation and isolation between tenants.                 Proficiency in implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms for multi-tenant applications, including role-based access control (RBAC) and fine-grained permissions management.             Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

column2: Your Opportunity    6+ years of IT experience with a min of 3+ years in Data Science (AI/ML)   Strong programming skills in Python  Experience with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)   Hands-on AI/ML modeling experience of complex datasets combined with a strong understanding of the theoretical foundations of AI/ML (Research Oriented).  Expertise in most of the following areas: supervised & unsupervised learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, federated learning, time series forecasting, Bayesian statistics, and optimization.  Hands-on experience on design, and optimizing LLM, natural language processing (NLP) systems, frameworks, and tools.  Building RAG application independently using available open source LLM models.  Comfortable working in the cloud and high-performance computing environments (e.g., AWS/ Azure/GCP, Databricks).    Roles and Responsibility    Your primary responsibility is to Architect, design and develop AI application on Azure cloud / On-prem development platform.  Lead the AIML solution design/development for various applications depending on business requirements  Prototypes and do proof of concepts (PoC) in one or all the following areas: LLM, NLP, DL (Deep Learning), ML (Machine Learning), object detection/classification, tracking, etc.  Stay up to date with the latest advancements in LLM, NLP, deep learning, machine learning, and object detection algorithms, and proactively identify opportunities to leverage new technologies for improved solutions.  You will work with a team of researchers and engineers to build state-of-the-art language models that can understand and generate human-like text.  Work with business users to translate functional requirements into data specifications  Collaborate with data scientists and business users to transform domain know-how into functional requirements.  Data Analysis and Preprocessing: Collect and preprocess large-scale text corpora to train and fine-tune language models. Conduct data analysis to identify patterns, trends, and insights that can inform model development and improvement.  Language Model Development: Utilize off-the-shelf LLM services, such as Azure OpenAI, to integrate LLM capabilities into applications, and collaborate with the research team to design and develop state-of-the-art language models.  Model Training and Evaluation: Train and fine-tune language models using appropriate machine-learning frameworks and tools.  Research and Innovation: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in the field of natural language processing and machine learning.    Qualifications    B.E./ B. Tech / M. Tech/ MCA in computer science, artificial intelligence, or a related field  Python, RDBMS, Big Data, deep learning framework, AIML libraries in python, LLMs, Azure DataBricks ML platform    Additional Qualifications:   Good communication Skills and Project Management   Employee Type:  Assignee / Regular  Travel:  Yes, 10% of the Time  Relocation Eligible:  Yes.

column2: A career within Data and Analytics services will provide you with the opportunity to help organisations uncover enterprise insights and drive business results using smarter data analytics      We focus on a collection of organisational technology capabilities, including business intelligence, data management, and data assurance that help our clients drive innovation, growth, and change within their organisations in order to keep up with the changing nature of customers and technology      We make impactful decisions by mixing mind and machine to leverage data, understand and navigate risk, and help our clients gain a competitive edge      As part of our Analytics and Insights Consumption team, you ll analyze data to drive useful insights for clients to address core business issues or to drive strategic outcomes      Youll use visualization, statistical and analytics models, AI/ML techniques, Modelops and other techniques to develop these insights                    Job Description:                            GenAI DevOps - Manager (PwC US AC)              PwC US - Acceleration Center is seeking a seasoned GenAI DevOps Engineer to take on the role of Manager within our dynamic team.              As a GenAI DevOps Engineer Manager, you will be instrumental in leading the design, implementation, and maintenance of infrastructure and deployment processes for our GenAI projects.              The ideal candidate should have a profound background in DevOps practices, with a specialized focus on GenAI technologies, and possess extensive knowledge in cloud computing, automation, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.                Responsibilities:                  Lead a team of DevOps engineers in understanding the infrastructure and deployment needs of GenAI projects to develop scalable and robust solutions.                  Oversee the design, implementation, and maintenance of infrastructure that supports high-availability and high-performance for GenAI applications.                  Champion the automation of infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and deployment processes using tools such as Azure DevOps Pipeline (CICD) and others.                  Develop, manage, and optimize CI/CD pipelines to streamline and automate the software delivery process for GenAI projects.                  Monitor system performance and implement solutions to improve scalability, efficiency, and reliability of GenAI applications.                  Enforce and enhance security protocols and best practices to safeguard GenAI systems and data.                  Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams including data scientists, engineers, and developers to ensure seamless integration and effective deployment of GenAI models and applications.                  Address and resolve complex infrastructure and deployment challenges, providing expert guidance and solutions.                  Maintain cutting-edge knowledge of GenAI technologies and DevOps practices to continually advance our capabilities and recommend innovative enhancements.                  Provide mentorship and professional development opportunities to junior team members and direct reports.                  Requirements      :                  Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field.                  10+ years of relevant technical experience, with a strong emphasis on DevOps practices in GenAI projects.                  Expertise in Azure DevOps Pipeline (CICD) and similar automation tools.                  Advanced skills in infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform, ARM templates, or equivalent.                  Proficient in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, or Python.                  Deep knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools such as Kubernetes.                  Extensive experience with Azure AI technologies, including Azure Kubernetes, Azure OpenAI, Azure EventHub, and Azure Data Lake, among others.                  Comprehensive understanding of cloud computing platforms such as Azure, AWS, or GCP.                  Exceptional problem-solving, analytical, and project management skills.                  Excellent leadership, communication, and collaboration abilities.                  Capable of thriving in a fast-paced and evolving environment.                  Nice to Have Skills      :                  Experience with additional cloud services like Databricks, Azure Cloud, AWS Cloud, and GCP Cloud.                  Relevant advanced certifications in DevOps or cloud computing platforms.

column2: As a GenAI DevOps Engineer, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and deployment processes for our GenAI projects.          The ideal candidate should have a strong background in DevOps practices, with a focus on GenAI technologies, and possess a solid understanding of cloud computing, automation, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.                  Responsibilities:              - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the infrastructure and deployment requirements for GenAI projects.              - Design, implement, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure solutions for GenAI applications.              - Automate infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and deployment processes using Azure DevOps Pipeline (CICD) or similar tools.              - Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to enable efficient and automated software delivery for GenAI projects.              - Monitor and optimize system performance, scalability, and reliability for GenAI applications.              - Implement and maintain security measures and best practices to protect GenAI systems and data.              - Collaborate with data scientists, data engineers, and software developers to ensure smooth integration and deployment of GenAI models and applications.              - Troubleshoot and resolve infrastructure and deployment issues in a timely manner.              - Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in GenAI technologies and recommend innovative solutions to enhance DevOps processes.              - Mentor and provide guidance to junior team members.                  Requirements:              - Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.              - 3-5 years of relevant technical/technology experience, with a focus on GenAI projects.              - Strong knowledge of Azure DevOps Pipeline (CICD) or similar tools.              - Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform, ARM templates, or similar.              - Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, or Python.              - Familiarity with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.              - Experience with Azure AI Search, Azure Kubernetes, Azure OpenAI, Azure EventHub, Azure Document Intelligence, Azure Data Lake, Keda, DataDog, and Cosmos DB.              - Knowledge of cloud computing platforms such as Azure, AWS, or GCP.              - Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.              - Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.              - Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.                  Nice to Have Skills:              - Experience with Databricks, Azure Cloud, AWS Cloud, GCP Cloud.              - Relevant certifications in DevOps or cloud computing.

column2: The Sales Intake Manager plays a critical role in providing a seamless support experience for Account Teams and mobilizing assistance to address a customer issues. column2: Askmeoffers.com, a unit of Lussac International Private Limited, is a leading online platform that provides users with the latest coupons, deals, and discounts for a wide range of products and services. Our mission is to help consumers save money while shopping online by offering the best deals from various e-commerce stores. As a rapidly growing company, we are constantly innovating and expanding our services to enhance the online shopping experience for our users. Job Description: We are looking for a talented Python Software Developer to join our team and work on our project, Askmeoffers Chrome extension. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the Chrome extension, which provides users with real-time access to the latest coupons and deals while they browse online stores. You will collaborate with our development team to enhance the functionality and user experience of the extension, ensuring seamless integration with popular e-commerce platforms. Role & Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain the Askmeoffers Chrome extension using Python programming language - Implement features to provide users with real-time access to coupons, deals, and discounts while browsing online stores - Collaborate with designers and front-end developers to ensure a seamless user experience - Integrate the extension with popular e-commerce platforms and APIs - Optimize performance and scalability of the extension to handle large volumes of user traffic - Stay up-to-date with the latest web technologies and best practices for Chrome extension development Preferred Candidate Profile: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field - Proven experience as a Python Software Developer, preferably working on Chrome extensions or similar web applications - Strong proficiency in Python programming language - Experience with web scraping techniques and APIs - Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - Knowledge of Chrome extension development and Chrome Web Store policies is a plus - Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills - Good communication and teamwork abilities Perks and Benefits: - Competitive salary package - Flexible working hours - Opportunity to work on innovative projects with cutting-edge technologies - Dynamic and collaborative work environment - Career growth and advancement opportunities - Health insurance and other employee benefits How to Apply: If you are interested in this position and meet the qualifications listed above, please submit your updated CV to HR at upasana@askmeoffers.com. Please include a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and explaining why you are the right fit for this role. We look forward to hearing from you!

column2: Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned.        Defines, describes, diagrams and documents the role and interaction of the high-level technological and human components that combine to provide cost effective and innovative solutions to meet evolving business needs.      Promotes, guides and governs good architectural practice through the application of well-defined, proven technology and human interaction patter        Job Description:                    The Senior Principal Technologist (Data Architect) role is responsible for delivering data architecture solutions aligned with business capability needs and enterprise standards.              This role works with Enterprise Solution Architects, Business Solution Architects and Technical Architects and external service providers to ensure data and information models and technologies align with stated architecture strategies and Medtronic s standards and delivery capabilities.                          In a delivery capacity, this role will work with Business Analysts to review and complete business capability needs, definitions, and requirements, data analysis, data modeling, technical specification writing, and working with development organizations to ensure designs are delivered.                          Key deliverables include:                                  Market trending key technology vendor assessments                              Data-centric technology roadmaps and standards maintenance                              Data-centric technology architecture standards reference models                              Project-level Architecture Definition Documents (data model business value alignment components)                              Input to business capability models, assessments, roadmaps                              Input to enterprise solution strategy assessments across capability technology areas          The Data Architect is a key leader in the identification of risks opportunities with the current data and supporting technical landscape, identifying recommending the implementation of overarching model and platform strategies, directing initiatives to mitigate risk, and contributing to the data and information community of practice activities (e.g., templates, processes, execution models).                          This role will serve as a delivery team member and responsible to review new initiatives and provide architecture guidance and decisions regarding the viability of data flows and models, components, design and operationalize the landscape, and participate as required within the Architecture Review Board to establish and maintain standards.          This role also mentors other Medtronic employees to develop architecture and structure strategic planning and subject matter expertise.                POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES:                                        Coordinate data model, flow, and technology aspects of solution architecture design, implementation, and modification activities across projects, teams and key process and technology leaders.                              Ensure all data architecture aspects of solution design and analysis work within the Architecture Definition Document is documented and included in the architecture repositories.          Generate Solution Architecture, Data Model, and ETL specifications to match business outcome requirements.                              Consult with business and technology (application, infrastructure) development projects to fit systems and desired information outcomes to business capability needs, and identify when it is necessary to modify the solution architecture to accommodate project needs.                              Partner with Business Solution Architects and Analysts and Data Modelers on requirements gathering or clarification and ensure alignment to desired business outcomes.                              Partner with other architects to analyze:            o                    Enterprise business drivers to determine corresponding change requirements.            o                    The IT environment to detect critical deficiencies and recommend broad-based solutions for improvement.            o                    Data and information management and related technology industry and market trends, and determine their potential advantage to or impact on the enterprise.                              Establish document data architecture design principles and standard reference models (standard architecture design supporting future architecture needs).                              Works with and advises stakeholders, project teams, and peers in areas assigned on project needs and design.                              Estimate work effort for development and enhancement requests supporting individual projects and broader team and enterprise strategies.                              Understand and use standard tools, processes, designs, and methodologies for project management, documentation, system development, and implementation.                              Actively support the architecture process, its outcome and ongoing results to senior leadership across Medtronic business and technology globally.                              Actively support the execution of the Solution Selection Process with enterprise, business solution, and technical architects; ensure alignment to enterprise standard solutions and define new solutions to meet business capability needs.                              Ensure adherence to the defined IT governance activities associated with the Solution Selection Policy Procedure (i.e., architecture boards, governance councils).                              As a member of the broader Medtronic architecture virtual organization, act as a key contributor to the enterprise reference architecture models (creation, maintenance, governance).                              Partner with the Enterprise Project Management Office (EPMO) to ensure alignment and execution of plans with project deliveries.                              Ensure Medtronics systems and information are protected in accordance with Medtronics Information Protection Policies and Standards, as well as best Information Protection practices.              Other duties responsibilities aligning to Medtronic s culture include:                              Contribute to and cultivate a culture which promotes the development of business capabilities, process excellence, and shared best practice execution                              Gather, review, assess and partner to drive new ideas, initiatives and projects through innovation, demand and global portfolio processes                              Foster a positive, engaging and challenging team-focused global work environment to ensure high productivity, employee engagement, and optimal performance                              Proactively engage with Medtronic business and Global IT partners to identify and define opportunities where the application of information technology can advance the strategic goals and objectives of Medtronic                              Act as role model by living and demonstrating the Medtronic Core competencies and values.                Must Have: Minimum Requirements                              10+ years of IT experience with B.A or B.S.; 8+ years of IT experience with M.A. or M.S.                              5+ years of experience aligned to a relevant architecture discipline (integrations, data, services, infrastructure)                                  6+ years of Oracle, SAP, or big data platform experience                              4+ years of Informatica experience                              3+ years of PowerDesigner experience                              2+ years of Python Coding experience                              2+ years of Snowflake experience                    SPECIALIZED KNOWLEDGE REQUIRED                                    3+ years of experience and strong knowledge of Enterprise-class architecture concepts, definition, and creation                              5+ years working with data integration, exchange, and/or warehousing solutions and experience with Enterprise-class data modeling methodologies and tools                              2+ years of experience with cloud-based solutions (e.g., applications (SaaS), platforms (PaaS), and infrastructure (IaaS)) a related data        Awareness of architecture frameworks, such as TOGAF or Zachman, and other service and control frameworks, such as ITIL or COBIT                      Experience with DBT                  Experience in implementation of data governance, administration and related processes          Excellent leadership and teamwork skills              Strong analytical and critical thinking skills          Strong collaboration and influencing skills          Broad knowledge of data analysis/database design technologies/tools in an operational environment          Strong technical acumen, decision column2: 1. AI Model Development: Developing and implementing machine learning models and algorithms for various AI applications, such as natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and more.      2. Data Processing and Analysis: Preprocessing, cleaning, and analyzing large datasets to extract valuable insights, patterns, and relationships that can be used to train machine learning models and improve search relevance in Elasticsearch.      3. Natural Language Processing (NLP): Applying NLP techniques to process and analyze textual data, build chatbots, sentiment analysis models, entity recognition systems, and other language-related applications.      4. Computer Vision: Working on computer vision projects, including image and video processing, object detection, image classification, facial recognition, and other computer vision tasks to enhance search capabilities within Elasticsearch.      5. Elasticsearch Configuration: Configuring and optimizing Elasticsearch indices, mappings, queries, aggregations, analyzers, and relevance scoring to ensure efficient search functionalities and effective data retrieval.      6. Search Relevance Optimization: Improving search relevance by tuning Elasticsearch settings, query optimization, relevance scoring, synonym management, and other techniques to enhance the search experience for users.      7. Model Deployment and Integration: Deploying machine learning models into production environments, integrating AI capabilities with Elasticsearch for real-time search, information retrieval, recommendation systems, and other applications.      8. Monitoring and Maintenance: Monitoring Elasticsearch clusters, managing indices, performing optimizations, troubleshooting issues, ensuring system scalability, and maintaining the overall health and performance of the Elasticsearch infrastructure.      9. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, data engineers, software developers, product managers, and stakeholders to understand requirements, design solutions, and deliver AI-powered search functionalities.      10. Documentation and Reporting: Documenting AI models, data processing pipelines, Elasticsearch configurations, system architecture, and any key findings or insights to facilitate knowledge sharing, reproducibility, and future enhancements.        Job Description:        1. AI Development: Developing machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex problems using tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.      2. Data Processing: Preprocessing and cleaning large datasets for training machine learning models, handling data pipelines, and integrating data from various sources for analysis.      3. Natural Language Processing (NLP): Implementing NLP techniques to analyze and process textual data, build sentiment analysis, chatbots, or information retrieval systems.      4. Computer Vision: Working on computer vision applications using libraries like OpenCV for image and video processing, object detection, facial recognition, or image classification.      5. Model Deployment: Deploying machine learning models using frameworks like TensorFlow Serving, Docker, or Kubernetes for real-time inference or batch processing.      6. Elasticsearch Configuration: Configuring and optimizing Elasticsearch indices, queries, aggregations, mappings, and analyzers for efficient search functionalities and data retrieval.      7. Search Relevance: Improving search relevance and results by tuning Elasticsearch settings, relevance scoring, boosting, synonyms, and filtering to enhance user experience.      8. Monitoring and Maintenance: Monitoring Elasticsearch clusters, managing indices, performing backups, scaling resources, and ensuring system reliability and performance.      9. Collaboration: Collaborating with data engineers, software developers, and business stakeholders to understand requirements, design solutions, and integrate AI capabilities with Elasticsearch.      10. Documentation: Documenting AI models, data pipelines, Elasticsearch configurations, and system architecture to facilitate knowledge sharing, troubleshooting, and future development.      11. Research and Innovation: Staying updated with the latest AI technologies, Elasticsearch features, best practices, and industry trends to suggest innovative solutions and improve existing processes.      12. Problem Solving: Analyzing and solving complex technical challenges related to AI development, data processing, search optimization, or system integration in a proactive and effective manner.

column2: We are seeking a talented and experienced Python Team Lead with a strong background in developing robust solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP)      With at least 8 years of Python development expertise, including proficiency in SQL, Flask, and data transformation, the ideal candidate will lead our team in architecting, developing, and deploying scalable applications and services      Leveraging their in-depth understanding of GCP services and tools, such as Google App Engine, Google Kubernetes Engine, and Google BigQuery, the Python Team Lead will collaborate closely with stakeholders to translate project requirements into technical solutions      This role offers an exciting opportunity to guide and mentor a team of developers while driving innovation in cloud-based Python development      Join us and be part of a dynamic team where your skills and leadership will play a pivotal role in delivering cutting-edge solutions on Google Cloud Platform              Responsibilities:      1. Lead a team of Python developers in designing, developing, and deploying scalable and efficient solutions on Google Cloud Platform.    2. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand project requirements and translate them into technical specifications and tasks for the team.    3. Architect, develop and maintain Python-based applications and services leveraging GCP services such as Google App Engine, Google Kubernetes Engine, Google Cloud Functions, Google Cloud Storage, etc.    4. Ensure the team follows best practices and coding standards in Python development, including code reviews, testing, and documentation.    5. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members, fostering their professional growth and development.    6. Collaborate with other teams such as DevOps, QA, and product management to ensure seamless integration and delivery of software solutions.    7. Troubleshoot and debug complex issues in production environments, ensuring high availability and reliability of systems.    8. Stay updated with the latest developments in Python, GCP, and cloud technologies, and recommend relevant tools and practices to improve efficiency and productivity.          Technical Requirements      1. Bachelor s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.    2. Minimum of 8 years of professional experience in Python development, with a strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.    3. Proven experience in developing solutions on the Google Cloud Platform, including proficiency in GCP services and tools such as Google App Engine, Google Kubernetes Engine, Google Cloud Functions, Google Cloud Storage, and Google BigQuery.    4. Strong proficiency in SQL and experience working with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and/or NoSQL databases (e.g., Google Cloud Datastore, MongoDB).    5. Expertise in developing RESTful APIs using Python frameworks such as Flask or Django, including API authentication, request handling, and response formatting.    6. Experience with data transformation and manipulation using Python libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, or TensorFlow, including cleaning, aggregating, and analyzing large datasets.    7. Familiarity with asynchronous programming in Python using frameworks like asyncio or libraries like Celery for background task processing.    8. Solid understanding of software testing principles and experience with testing frameworks such as pytest or unittest, including writing unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.    9. Proficiency in version control systems such as Git, including branching, merging, and resolving conflicts.    10. Good understanding of containerization technologies like Docker and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes for deploying and managing containerized applications.    11. Knowledge of web development technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and frontend frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js would be a plus.    12. Familiarity with message queueing systems such as RabbitMQ or Google Cloud Pub/Sub for building asynchronous and distributed systems.    13. Experience with data visualization libraries such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, or Plotly for creating insightful visualizations and dashboards.    14. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to optimize performance and scalability of Python applications, including profiling and performance tuning.    15. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.    16. Ability to adapt quickly to new technologies and frameworks, and a commitment to continuous learning and self-improvement.    17. Experience with Agile methodologies and project management tools such as Jira or Trello, including participating in sprint planning, backlog grooming, and daily stand-ups.                            Additional Knowledge & Skills          Good understanding of specifics of markup for modern browsers.      Understanding of Git , Bit bucket and other version management tools.      Understanding of postman, and any other API testing tools.      Understanding of SQL.      Experience with test automation for Front-End (unit and integration test suites)      Experience with JS task runners (Gulp, Grunt, Broccoli)      Experience building system in GCP or any other cloud platform.      Experience with NodeJS

column2: We are seeking a meticulous Reliability Analyst to join our Entry into Service Programs team     As a member of the Entry Into Service (EIS) team and being the (Regionals/General Aviation/ TurboShaft/ TurboFan/ APU) programs New Product Performance Engineering Specialist, you will be responsible for all related dependability processes and own the associated performance indexes (KPIs) for EIS and new company business cases     As a Reliability Analyst, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the support of business proposal risk assessment and the successful introduction of new products or systems into service     Part of a team of several experts, you will have the opportunity to contribute to integrated product teams (IPTs) and influence the redesign of parts which could affect the safety, reliability, maintainability and availability of a product or the cost of operation     You will be expected to grow into the subject matter expert for dependability metrics and management     You will be coordinating with various stakeholders across the company to ensure seamless integration and optimal performance of the products     Your expertise in conducting maintainability analyses and implementing improvement plans will be instrumental in ensuring accurate maintenance assumptions                           What your day to day will look like:         Lead Product Dependability activities for the (Regionals/ General Aviation/ TurboShaft/ TurboFan/ APU) Entry into service programs including trend monitoring, identifying reliability drivers, and driving PMT actions.     Conduct comprehensive reliability analyses (Weibull, Fly Forward Analysis) for new products or systems entering into service.     Prepare and present reliability reports to key stakeholders, communicate findings, progress, and recommendations effectively.     Analyze reliability test data to identify failure modes, trends, and areas for enhancement, providing actionable insights to relevant teams.     Suggest preventive and corrective actions based on reliability findings to improve product performance and minimize operational risks.     Collaborate with customer support teams to gather and analyze field data, ensuring continuous improvement in product reliability and customer satisfaction.     Stay updated on industry best practices, emerging technologies, and reliability engineering advancements to drive innovation and excellence in the entry into service programs.     Support new engine business cases using EIS and current engine programs to ensure proper engineering design and aftermarket lessons learned are considered.     Provide business forecast to support the development and flight test decisions in support of campaign reduction.     Support development of new business models and Lifecycle analysis     Participate in new engine business cases and EIS program definition and development KPI tracking         Some travel may be required             What you need to be successful:         Bachelor degree in Engineering/ Mathematics with 3-5 years of experience     Proven experience in reliability engineering, preferably within the context of development programs for complex products or systems.     Strong understanding of reliability analysis techniques, failure modes and effects analysis (FMEA), and root cause analysis (RCA).     Strong understanding of maintainability analysis techniques, including Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) and Mean Time to Repair (MTTR).     Excellent project management skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks and meet tight deadlines.     Effective communication and interpersonal skills, able to collaborate with diverse teams and stakeholders.     Detail-oriented mindset with a passion for driving continuous improvement and ensuring the highest level of product reliability.     Knowledge on Safety Management System (SMS), Numerical Risk Assessment (NRA) and other Risk Assessment methodologies would be a plus.     Solid computer skills (PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Access, Enovia, etc.)

column2: To help in building the detailed process maps, following the BPMN mapping standards, based on defined timelines. Review the controls in processes and identify process gaps across the EQ Group. This role will be critical in process standardization and re-engineering. Work with the Risk team on Organization Risk and Control Management. The role to be based out of Chennai location.         ?       Business Function       Process CoE team work closely with the EQ India Operation and EQ Group functions across UK and US in driving the initiatives to optimize end-to-end processes across the organization. Estabilishing a culture of continuous improvement and helping the organization to manage the operations efficiently through robust control frameworks and process standardization.     ?       Core Duties and Responsibilities         Understand and create standardized process flows using BPMN standards.     Identify opportunities to optimize end-to-end processes across the organization as per BPMN standards.     Work closely with the operations and transition team, to understand the migrating processes. Review the process to identify potential gaps while coming up with process flows.     Ensure that control measures are effectively integrated into daily process flows.     While mapping the processes, look for the effectiveness of controls, make recommendations for improvements as needed.     Perform trend analysis to anticipate potential challenges and implement preventive measures to mitigate.     Support the operations and risk teams in implementing robust control frameworks to mitigate identified risks.     Periodically review with Operations to update the revised processes and controls that the processes have underwent.     Take lead in implementing continuous improvement intiatives, proactively identify opportunities for enhancement.     Ensure the implementation of reviewed and revised processes and controls by the respective stakeholders.             Competencies and Experience         bachelors degree in Business administration, Finance, Information Technology, or a relevant field.     6 to 8 years of experience with minimum 3 to 4 years as a Business Process Analyst or in a similar role.     Hands on experience and certification in using business process mapping tools is a plus (eg, IBM Blueworks, Aris, Igraffx)     Strong understanding of business process management and notation (BPMN) methodologies and tools.     Proficiency and certification in process modeling and analysis techniques is required (eg, BPMN, Six Sigma, Lean).     In-depth knowledge about work/process standardization, risk identification and controls.     Experience with process automation, workflow management, or business process management systems is a plus.     Knowledge of agile methodologies and project management principles will be an added advantage.              Being a permanent member of the team at EQ you will be rewarded by our company benefits, these are just a few of what is on offer:             2 way transport provided     3 days of additional leaves on above statutory requirement along with 2 days of voluntary leaves to pursue the CSR initiatives      Business related certification expense reimbursement     Comprehensive Medical Assurance coverage for dependents Parents     Cab transport for staff working in UK US shift     Accidental Life cover 3 times of concerned CTC

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled senior data scientist to join our team. Responsibilities:             - Lead the development and implementation of data-driven solutions for clients     - Collaborate with clients to understand their business needs and develop solutions to meet those needs     - Develop statistical models and algorithms to analyze complex data sets     - Analyze and interpret data to identify patterns and trends     - Communicate insights and findings to clients in a clear and concise manner     - Mentor and train junior data scientists on technical and client presentation skills     - Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies in data science and analytics                   Qualifications:             - Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field     - 3+ years of experience in data science or analytics     - Strong programming skills in Python and SQL     - Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or PowerBI or QlikView would be an added benefit     - Experience with SQL and relational databases     - Strong client presentation and communication skills     - Ability to lead a team and work collaboratively with other departments     - Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail                   Job Requirement             1 Advanced statistical analysis: A senior data scientist should have a deep understanding of statistical concepts and techniques and be able to apply them to real-world problems.           2 Machine learning: A senior data scientist should have a strong background in machine learning techniques and be able to develop and deploy predictive models.           3 Data wrangling: A senior data scientist should have expertise in collecting, cleaning, and organizing large and complex data sets.           4 Programming skills: A senior data scientist should be proficient in programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL and be able to develop scalable and maintainable code.           5 Data visualization: A senior data scientist should be able to create compelling visualizations and reports that effectively communicate insights to stakeholders.           6 Business acumen: A senior data scientist should have a strong understanding of business operations and be able to develop data-driven solutions that align with organizational goals.           7 Communication skills: A senior data scientist should be able to communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.           8 Leadership skills: A senior data scientist should be able to lead a team of data scientists and work collaboratively with other departments to develop and implement data-driven solutions.           9 Project management: A senior data scientist should be able to manage complex data projects from start to finish, including scoping, planning, execution, and delivery.           10 Continuous learning: A senior data scientist should have a passion for continuous learning and be able to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in data science and analytics.

column2: Python Automation refers to the use of the Python programming language to automate repetitive tasks, streamline workflows, and increase efficiency in various domains     Python's simplicity, versatility, and extensive libraries make it a popular choice for automation purposes     Here are some key areas where Python automation is commonly applied:Scripting and Task Automation:Python can be used to write scripts that automate repetitive tasks, such as file operations, data processing, and system administration     Tasks like data extraction, data manipulation, data transformation, and report generation can be automated using Python     Web Scraping and Data Extraction:Python libraries like BeautifulSoup and Scrapy enable automated web scraping and extraction of data from websites     Web scraping can be used to gather information, monitor websites for updates, or collect data for analysis     Testing and Quality Assurance:Python's testing frameworks, such as PyTest and unit test, facilitate the automation of testing processes     Automated tests can be written to verify software functionality, performance, and reliability     Task Scheduling and Job Automation:Python's schedulers, such as Celery and AP Scheduler, allow the scheduling and execution of tasks or jobs at specific times or intervals     Automation of repetitive tasks like data backups, report generation, or data processing can be achieved using Python schedulers     GUI Automation:Python libraries like Py Auto GUI and Selenium enable the automation of GUI-based tasks and interactions with graphical user interfaces     GUI automation can be used for tasks such as automating software installations, simulating user inputs, or automating web browser interactions     System Administration and DevOps:Python can be used for system administration tasks like log analysis, server monitoring, or configuration management     Integration with tools like Ansible or Fabric allows automation of deployment, provisioning, and management of servers and infrastructure     Data Analysis and Reporting:Python, along with libraries like pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib, facilitates data analysis, visualization, and automated reporting     Automated scripts can be written to analyze data, generate insights, and produce reports or visualizations on a regular basis     Internet of Things (IoT) Automation:Python can be used to automate IoT devices, control sensors, collect data, and manage IoT infrastructure     With frameworks like Raspberry Pi and Micro Python, Python enables automation in home automation, robotics, and IoT applications     To leverage Python for automation, one needs proficiency in the Python programming language, understanding of relevant libraries and frameworks, and familiarity with automation concepts and best practices
column11: Automation, Data analysis, Manager Quality Assurance, Configuration management, Data processing, Scheduling, Selenium, Python, System administration, Data extraction

column2: Skill required:Knowledge AI - Artificial Intelligence (AI)  Designation:AI/ML Computational Science Specialist  Qualifications:BE/BTech/MTech/Phd  Years of Experience:7 to 11 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Insights & Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. You will be required to utilize the existing frameworks, standards, patterns to create architectural foundation and services necessary for AI applications that scale from multi-user to enterprise-class and demonstrate yourself as an expert by actively blogging, publishing research papers, and creating awareness in this emerging area. The Artificial Intelligence Innovation team is responsible for the creation, deployment, and managing the operation of projects. They help build responsible AI solutions that benefit users, communities, and society at large, guided by core principles that help deliver desired outcomes while engendering trust. The team collaborates with business experts, research, and platform engineers for coming up with creative solutions. In this role, you will be working on the interdisciplinary field about scientific methods, processes and systems to extract knowledge or insights from data in various forms, either structured or unstructured.  What are we looking for? Python (Programming Language)  Machine Learning  Natural Language Processing (NLP)  Deep Learning  GenAI / LLM / Prompt Engineering  Ability to perform under pressure  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Ability to understand business challenges  Focus on business outcomes and ability to work with different cross functional teams Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role, you need to analyze and solve moderately complex problems.  You are required to create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures.  You are required to understand the strategic direction set by senior management, clearly communicate team goals, deliverables, and keep the team updated on change.  Your primary upward interactions are with your direct supervisor.  You may interact with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture.  You will be provided with guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments.  The decisions that are made by you will often impact your team.  You would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team.  Please note this role may require you to work in rotational shifts.

Strategy Development:    Develop migration strategies, methodologies and best practices to ensure efficient and effective data transfer while minimizing risk and disruption to business operations. Data Mapping and Transformation:    Design and implement data mapping and transformation rules to ensure accurate and consistent data migration between source and target systems, considering data format conversions, field mappings and data cleansing requirements.       Quality Assurance:    Develop and execute comprehensive testing strategies to validate data migration processes, ensuring data integrity, completeness and compliance with regulatory requirements.       Stakeholder Communication:    Collaborate with key stakeholders, including IT teams, business analysts and end-users, to gather requirements, communicate project status, and address concerns throughout the migration lifecycle.       Risk Management:    Identify potential risks and issues related to data migration projects and develop mitigation strategies to address them, such as contingency plans, data backup procedures and security measures. column2: As an AI Engineer specializing in Generative AI applications for clinical data, you will play a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions that leverage cutting-edge Large Language Models (LLMs) to revolutionize clinical business decision-making. Act as a technical point of contact for customers, understanding their requirements, addressing concerns, and providing technical support throughout the solution deployment phase. Extensive experience in AI, ML, and deep learning, with a focus on Generative AI applications for clinical healthcare data, .      Proficiency in Python programming language and deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Faces Transformers library.      Proficient in creating prompt templates using Langchain framework and employing various prompt engineering techniques with RAG for orchestrating API knowledge.      Excellent problem-solving abilities, analytical thinking, and attention to detail.      Effective communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment and interact with customers.      Experience in utilizing modern LLM frameworks in Gen AI, RAG Architectures, such as langchain, llamaindex, and vectordb concepts are an advantage.
