column2: The SAP BODS Data Migration Developer role is responsible for working in the Data Management team in various areas within the project life cycle to develop and deliver successful conversion of identified data objects from legacy systems.          Should have experience in SAP Data Migration and be able to align the activities as per the Program / Data Migration Plan.          The SAP BODS Data Migration Developer is responsible for working closely with the Functional Data Conversion team to identify field mapping for the Data objects with the legacy Source system. He/she will be responsible for Data Extraction, Data Analysis, Data Construction and ETL activities during the project life cycle using the SAP BODS tool.                 Requirements          6-10 years of relevant experience with SAP Data Migration (BODS).         Hands-on experience with SAP BODS 4.3 SPS 12 & BODS 4.2 SPS14, preferably BODS 4.3         Hands-on experience in Implementation & upgrade to S/4 HANA (1909 or 2020)         Hands-on experience with Migration Cockpit, SAP RDM Template         Hands-on experience with Master Data Management, Data Governance, Data Quality & LTMC, LSMW, Idocs, etc.         Provide technical/functional subject matter expertise and technical/functional clarification for SAP data objects and configuration in support of design sessions with related Process Teams to confirm functionality-driven data standards.         Establish connectivity to legacy systems and develop and schedule ETL extraction jobs from legacy systems.         Design, develop, unit test, and debug complex data conversion jobs and workflows using SAP Data Services, IDocs, LSMWs, etc.         Work closely with the Functional Teams to identify and document the data objects field mapping, transformation, and validation rules.         Support the development of unit and end-to-end data migration test plans and test scripts (including testing for data extraction, transformation, data loading, and data validation).         Promote code to data conversion environment (if applicable)         Perform data load activities for each mock load, cutover simulation and production deployment identified in the plan into the environments identified.         Provide technical support, defect management, and issue resolution during all testing cycles, including Mock Data Load cycles.         Complete all necessary data migration documentation necessary to support system validation/compliance requirements.         Participate in and support end-user training for SAP Data Conversion tools (e.g. Information Steward) and data conversion processes (e.g. Resolving data readiness errors, Mock data load validation activities).         Provide technical support, defect management, and issue resolution during Production deployment and hypercare support.               Others        Bachelors degree in the areas of Computer Science, Engineering, Information Systems, Business, or equivalent field of study preferred

column2: This person will play an important role in partnering with our clients to evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of their current tech stack, along with how they could integrate artificial intelligence solutions into their enterprise. This is not an engineering role, but a business role that requires a deep understanding of business operations and strategic thinking across multiple industries (an MBA is strongly preferred). A passion for artificial intelligence and some hands-on experience with implementing AI and machine learning projects is critical, as you ll be working with our software engineers and data scientists on very complex concepts and solutions. You must be able to analyze and model out the economic and operational impact of new solutions for our clients, and then explain these ideas to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.        You will collaborate closely with our clients senior executives, department heads, and our internal cross-functional teams to develop actionable insights that guide new tech adoption and transformation strategies. This is a fast-paced job with room for significant career growth.       ?           JOB RESPONSIBILITIES & EXPERIENCE           Interview different client department heads to gather insights about their day-to-day work to identify areas where certain technology upgrades could potentially help them.         Co-lead discovery sessions with our engineers to evaluate clients existing AI capabilities, data infrastructure, and overall technology stack. Identify gaps, opportunities, and potential areas for how Plan A could help improve their tech infrastructure and their business.         Work with our software engineers to conduct a comprehensive analysis of each organizations data readiness, interoperability, scalability, security and ability to enhance their technologies.         Provide clients with an understanding of how new tech advancements like AI are impacting their industry, their competitive position, their staff and clients, and their decision-making processes.          Create tailored AI adoption strategies and roadmaps that align with the clients overall business goals. Outline phased implementation plans, highlighting quick wins and long-term transformation initiatives.         Work closely with both our clients and Plan A colleagues to think through possible solutions to client issues.         Build financial models, ROI projections, and roll-out plans to help clients understand both strategically and tactically how to implement our recommendations.          Create and then present final recommendation decks and reports to clients that distill complex AI and other technical concepts and recommendations into clear and concise presentations for diverse audiences, including C-suite executives.          Must have outstanding written and verbal communication skills and fluent English to lead presentations to executives, board members, and technical staff.          This person will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in the software world, industry trends, and best practices, and to contribute to thought leadership materials, whitepapers, webinars and case studies that showcase our expertise.         Experience collaborating with engineers across multiple countries.         Proactive, driven, and passionate about driving innovation and excellence.         Excellent Excel and financial modeling skills.         Experience leading management consulting engagements in at least two very different industries.         An MBA or a degree in computer science is strongly preferred.         This person can be based from home, but the job does require a few days of travel each month to client offices
column11: Computer science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning, Management consulting, Manager Technology, Staff augmentation, Outsourcing, Operations, Financial modelling, Business operations

column2: Working alongside our generalist consultants, Bains Advanced Analytics Group (AAG) helps clients across industries solve their biggest problems using our expertise in data science, customer insights, statistics, machine learning, data management, supply chain analytics and data engineering. Stationed in our global offices, AAG team members hold advanced degrees in computer science, engineering, AI, data science, physics, statistics, mathematics, and other quantitative disciplines, with backgrounds in a variety of fields including tech, data science, marketing analytics and academia.                   WHAT YOU LL DO             As a member of the growing Data Science and Machine Learning (ML) Engineering team in Bain s Advanced Analytics Group, you will:               Develop, deploy and support column2: As Engineering Manager - Machine Learning & Perception at Motive, you will be a part of a passionate team whose mission is to bring intelligence to the world s trucking fleets. Our team is focused on building technology to understand driving behavior, identify risk factors, and intelligently suggest coachable events that makes roads safer, improves fleet safety and potentially saves millions of dollars for our customers.      You will have a unique opportunity to work with a high caliber and fast-paced team of experienced and well-published researchers and engineers in AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision, with a track record of delivering highly performant safety products for the physical economy.      You will be responsible for leading a talented team of machine learning, computer vision and embedded engineers, fostering innovation, and ensuring the successful delivery of projects aligned with Motive s business objectives. You will also build pipelines with edge processing, large and scalable MLOps infrastructure and vast amounts of in-house data to train, test, and validate production quality AI systems.      The role covers the entire lifecycle of AI products from conception to development, deployment and completion and Motive s AI pipeline from camera to customer. Successful candidates will bring their technical expertise in AI, machine learning or computer vision and project management experience to design, plan, execute and deliver AI products.        What You ll Do:          Lead teams that architect and deliver on multiple projects with cross-functional dependencies      Lead technical design of the next-generation of AI-driven Motive products      Be a subject matter expert in one or more AI, ML, deep learning or computer vision domains & provide high-level scientific and technical leadership for the Motive AI team      Partner with leadership to understand product needs, identify priorities and drive AI/ML/CV roadmap and strategy for Motive s product and platforms      Be a highly technical as well as effective people manager, set clear expectations & goals, measure team performance and impact      Increase visibility of Motive AI and help grow the team          What We re Looking For:          5+ years of experience in developing products with machine learning, AI, deep learning, or another related technical area      3+ years of experience as a technical project manager or scientific lead for AI/ML projects from concept to product, managing a team of 5-10 individual contributors      Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, mathematics or related field      Experience in one or more of Python, C/C++, ML & deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow/Keras, PyTorch, Keras, scikit-learn, H20)      Ability to solve problems analytically and creatively      Strong communication (written and oral) skills      Familiarity/experience with hands-on development in computer vision with applications in the automotive domain is a strong plus      Familiarity/experience with containerizing using Docker and/or other environments; deployment on AWS, Kubernetes/Kubeflow, CI/CD pipelines or other distributed/cloud platforms is a plus      Familiarity/experience with embedded machine learning and/or optimizing and deploying ML models on embedded devices is a strong plus

Build and optimize CV/ML algorithms for real-time performance so they can run on our embedded platform, i.e., the next-gen AI dashcam. column2: As a Qualcomm Software Engineer, you will design, develop, create, modify, and validate embedded and cloud edge software, applications, and/or specialized utility programs that launch cutting-edge, world class products that meet and exceed customer needs. Qualcomm Software Engineers collaborate with systems, hardware, architecture, test engineers, and other teams to design system-level software solutions and obtain information on performance requirements and interfaces.                 Minimum Qualifications:         Bachelors degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 2+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.    OR   Masters degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 1+ year of Software Engineering or related work experience.   OR   PhD in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.     2+ years of academic or work experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.                               More details below:             Join the growing team at Qualcomm focused on advancing state-of-the-art in Machine Learning. The team uses Qualcomm chips extensive heterogeneous computing capabilities to allow inference of trained neural networks on-device without a need for connection to the cloud. Our inference engine is designed to help developers run neural network models trained in a variety of frameworks on Snapdragon platforms at blazing speeds while still sipping the smallest amount of power. See your work directly impact billions of devices around the world.             Responsibilities:           In this position, you will be responsible for the development and commercialization of ML solutions like Snapdragon Neural Processing Engine (SNPE) SDK on Qualcomm SoCs. You would be porting AI/ML solutions to various platforms and optimize the performance on multiple hardware accelerators (like CPU/GPU/NPU). You will have expert knowledge in deployment aspects of large software C/C++ dependency stacks using best practices. You will also have to keep up with the fast-paced development happening in the industry and academia to continuously enhance our solution from software engineering as well as machine learning standpoint.                                   Requirements:             Master s or Bachelor s degree in Computer science or equivalent.   3-7 years of relevant work experience in software development.         Basics of Deep-learning and familiarity with neural network operators.   Strong development skills in C and C++.   Excellent analytical and debugging skills.         Knowledge of parallel computing systems and associated languages like OpenCL, CUDA.         Good communication skills (verbal, presentation, written).         Ability to collaborate across a globally diverse team and multiple interests.                                   Preferred Qualifications             Knowledge of object-oriented software development.   Knowledge of Processor architecture and system design fundamentals.   Experience with optimizing algorithms for AI hardware accelerators (like CPU/GPU/NPU).   Background in mathematical operations: linear algebra, fast-math libraries.   Floating-point, Fixed-point representations and Quantization concepts.                                                                                                               Qualcomm is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited                                                                                                                          resumes/applications.

column2: Job Description: Data Scientist Company: BOSS Staffing Solutions Location: Hyderabad Type: Full-time About the Company: Join us to work for client who is a leader in Deep Technology Services and Solutions, dedicated to innovating and transforming the way data is shaping the industry. We are committed to leveraging advanced technologies to solve real-world challenges and enhance decision-making processes. Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled Data Scientist with specialized expertise in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Deep Learning to join our dynamic team. This role focuses on developing and refining a conversational intelligent assistant for enterprise product. The ideal candidate will be instrumental in driving the project from conceptualization to deployment, ensuring the system is robust, efficient, and user-centric. ***DATA ANALYST experience is NOT suitable for this role. DATA SCIENTIST experience candidates ONLY are requested to apply.*** Key Responsibilities : Model Development : Design, build, and train advanced machine learning models with a focus on NLP and Deep Learning to power conversational AI within our platform. Use LLMs to solve complex problems for the enterprises. Data Management : Collect, process, and maintain data pipelines, ensuring data integrity, efficiency, and alignment with project needs. Analytics and Testing : Implement and execute robust testing frameworks to evaluate the effectiveness of AI models, focusing on continual improvement and optimization. Collaboration and Leadership : Work closely with cross-functional teams including software developers and product managers to integrate AI capabilities into enterprise platforms. Provide insights and lead discussions on innovative AI solutions. Research and Development : Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI, NLP, and machine learning. Apply cutting-edge research to practical applications within our projects. Documentation and Reporting : Maintain comprehensive documentation of the development process, model architectures, and performance metrics. Prepare reports and presentations to share findings and progress with stakeholders. Qualifications : Education : PhD or Master's degree or B. Tech degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. Experience : Minimum of 5 years of professional experience (B. Tech) or 3 years of professional experience (Master's) and 0 - 1.5 years of experience (PhD) in NLP or Deep Learning. Proven track record of developing and deploying machine learning models, particularly in the context of NLP techniques and models (e.g., BERT, GPT-3, Llama, Mixtral) and their applications. Technical Skills : Proficient in programming languages such as Python and frameworks/libraries like TensorFlow, Py Torch, Keras, and Hugging Face Transformers. Experience with SQL and database management systems along with insightful knowledge of Relational Algebra. Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and machine learning deployment techniques. Excellent Analytical and Communication Skills. What We Offer: A competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package. Opportunities for professional development and access to learning resources. A creative and innovative work environment. The chance to work on cutting-edge projects that influence the Enterprises globally and locally alike. How to Apply : Please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining your interest in the role and how your skills and experience align with our project needs to  hr3@bossllcusa.com . We look forward to exploring how your expertise in NLP and Deep Learning can contribute to the success of our Platform Trainer project.

column2: We are seeking a dynamic very hardworking Data Science Engineer to join our dynamic, multi-functional team of skilled engineers to working with powerful safe AI following best in class data science methodologies     You should have a passion for data and a strong sense of creativity, as these attributes are important for redefining industry standards and pushing the boundaries of what can be achieved through data-driven solutions             In This Role, Your Responsibilities Will Be:         Collaborate with multi-functional teams to find opportunities to apply data-driven insights and develop innovative solutions to complex business problems.     Develop, implement, and maintain data pipelines and ETL processes to collect, clean, and curate large and diverse datasets from various sources.     Design, build, and deploy predictive and prescriptive machine learning/deep learning/large language models to help the organization make better data-driven AI assisted decisions.     Perform exploratory data analysis, data sanitizing, feature engineering, and data visualization to gain insights and identify potential areas for improvement.     Optimize machine learning models and algorithms to ensure scalability, accuracy, and performance while minimizing computational costs.     Continuously monitor and evaluate the performance of deployed models, updating or refining them as needed.     Stay abreast of the latest developments in data science, machine learning, and big data technologies to drive innovation and maintain a competitive advantage.     Develop and implement standard methodologies in data management, data modeling, code, and data quality assurance.     Communicate effectively with team members, collaborators, and senior management to translate data insights into actionable strategies and recommendations.         Miscellaneous Activities:          Active participation and contributions to innovation activities like ideathons, hackathon         Who You are:             You establish clear responsibilities and processes for monitoring work and measuring results You analyze multiple and diverse sources of information to define problems accurately before moving to solutions even in the absence of complete information You relate comfortably with people across levels, functions, cultures, and geography             For This Role, You Will Need:         Bachelor s degree in computer science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field or a masters degree or higher is preferred.     1-3 years of experience with popular data science libraries and frameworks such as scikit-learn, SciPy, TensorFlow, PyTorch, NumPy and Pandas.     1-3 years of experience in data science industry projects leveraging machine learning, deep learning, transformer based large language models or any of other innovative AI technologies.     Strong programming skills in Python is must.     Knowledge of    MATLAB Simulink    Regression learner apps, app design will be preferred.     Solid understanding of calculus, linear algebra, probability, machine learning algorithms, Transformer architecture-based model and data modeling techniques.     Proficiency in data visualization tools, such as Matplotlib or Seaborn or Bokeh or Dash.     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with an ability to synthesize complex data sets into actionable insights.     Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present technical concepts to non-technical audiences.         Preferred Qualifications that Set You Apart:         Qualification: B.E/Post graduate in - Mathematics, Computer Science, Electronics Instrumentation.     Basic understanding of machine learning and statistical algorithms and techniques.     Exp 2to 5 Yrs. with minimum 6months in LLM          Certifications          Possession of relevant certification/s in data science from reputed universities specializing in AI.         Industry-Specific Experience          Prior experience in engineering domain would be nice to have.

column2: The Account Executive is responsible for driving sales of Tableau products within the Small and Medium sized businesses (SMB) in India market     This role manages all aspects of the sales process including prospecting, lead management, qualification, product demonstrations, evaluation, close and account care     This is a quota carrying sales position that requires a high volume of activities and plays an integral role in the success of the overall sales team           Some of the things you'll be doing include:           Define and execute territory sales plans and then meet and exceed sales goals (quotas) through prospecting, qualifying, managing and closing sales opportunities within the SMB business     Develop and manage sales pipeline - prospect and assess new sales potential while moving a large number of transactions simultaneously through the sales pipeline     Conduct a high-volume of activities with customers including calls, emails, demos, webinars     Manage and track customer and transactional information in a CRM system     Coordinate resources throughout the sales cycle, including product support and sales engineering     Provide initial product demonstrations and general support to prospective customers     Provide regular reporting of pipeline and forecast through the CRM system     Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products     Practice effective, excellent communication with management, customers and support staff     Participate in team building and company growth activities including strategy setting, sales training, marketing efforts and customer care.     Travel to customer locations in support of sales efforts.           Who you are:             Experienced   . You have at least 6+ years of direct sales experience, preferably in high volume, transactional sales of technology or services in India market, especially the North region.       Amazing Salesperson   . You have a desire, even an obsession, to bring / expand customers into the Tableau franchise and maximize revenue. You have the ability to develop and manage a sales pipeline with a proven track record of handling and closing a large number of transactions simultaneously.       Technically Savvy   . You don t shy away from opportunities to get into technology - and you can learn it quickly.       Go-Getter   . You are willing to go the extra mile with a strong work ethic; self-directed and resourceful.       Mission-Driven   . You get it and understand Tableau s mission deeply in some way. You believe Tableau will become one of the most important technology companies in the world, you want to be a contributing member of a winning sales team, and you want to have fun all the way.       Effective Communicator   . You are clear and persuasive in verbal and written English communications with highly effective use of email and telephone.       Cross-Cultural   . You have experience relating to customers from a variety of countries.       You are a Recruiter!    Tableau hires company builders and, in this role, you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world

column2: Job description   1. Design, Develop and Leverage expertise in video analytics for object detection, anomaly detection, behavioral detection, facial recognition, activity tracking etc. 2. Design, develop, and optimize data pipelines using Python and cloud services for efficient data processing. 3. Implement advanced machine learning models for predictive analytics, anomaly detection, and forecasting. 4. Design to ensure data quality, reliability, and scalability of analytical solutions. 5. Stay updated on emerging trends in data science, cloud technologies, and AI/ML frameworks to drive innovation. Technical Experience / Skills Required (Mandatory)   1. Strong programming skills in Python with experience in libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Scikit-learn. 2. Proficiency in SQL for data querying, manipulation, and database management. Both SQL and NoSQL knowledge preferable. 3. Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for data storage and processing. 4. Expertise in machine learning algorithms, model evaluation techniques, and feature engineering. 5. Knowledge of data visualization tools such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, or Tableau for generating insights from data. 6. Ability to create Scalable Back End Secure APIs in FlaskAPI/Python. 7. Advanced Python programming knowledge with OOPS, Functional Programming, multithreading/multiprocessing. 8. Exposure to deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow, Keras, or PyTorch for neural network development and Transformer (Encoder-Decoder), Attention based models. Preferred Skills (Good to have but not mandatory)   1. Familiarity with Low-Level Machine Learning (LLM) concepts for algorithm optimization and performance tuning. 2. Understanding of big data technologies such as Apache Spark for distributed computing and data analysis. 3. Experience with containerization tools like Docker and orchestration frameworks like Kubernetes. . Ideal candidate should have a  proven track record of successfully delivering data-driven solutions and projects, be a quick and self-learner of new technologies, and a team player. He/ She should be proficient in spoken and written English and should possess excellent problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, and strong attention to detail. Candidates who can join immediately will be given preference. This is a  full time position and not a remote / WFH opportunity. Only Kolkata based candidates should apply. Remuneration : Fixed monthly salary Leave benefits Performance bonus Health Insurance

column2: As an IoT (Internet of Things) Developer, your role revolves around designing, developing, and implementing IoT solutions that connect devices, sensors, and systems to the Internet or other networks.                                    Responsibilities                              Collaborate with stakeholders to understand project requirements and design end-to-end IoT solutions. This involves selecting appropriate hardware, communication protocols, and cloud platforms based on the use case.                        Develop software for embedded systems and IoT devices. Use programming languages such as C, C++, Python, or JavaScript to program micro-controllers and sensors.                        IoT Platform Integration: Integrate IoT devices and sensors with cloud platforms and IoT platforms. This includes setting up device connectivity, data ingestion, and authentication mechanisms.                        Communication Protocols: Implement communication protocols such as MQTT, CoAP, or HTTP to facilitate data transmission between devices and backend systems.                        Data Management: Design data storage and management strategies for handling data generated by IoT devices. Utilize databases, time-series databases, or cloud storage solutions for data retention and analysis.                        Security and Privacy: Implement security measures to protect data and devices from unauthorized access and cyber threats. Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.                        Device Management: Develop device management solutions to monitor remotely and control IoT devices. This includes OTA (Over-The-Air) updates and device monitoring functionalities.                        Data Analytics and Visualization: Process and analyze IoT data to derive meaningful insights. Create visualizations and dashboards to present data in a user-friendly manner.                        Edge Computing: Implement edge computing techniques to perform data processing and analysis closer to the data source, reducing latency and optimizing bandwidth usage.                        Testing and Validation: Conduct thorough testing of IoT solutions to ensure the reliability, performance, and interoperability of devices and systems.                        Integration with External Systems: Integrate IoT solutions with other enterprise systems, applications, or APIs to enable seamless data exchange and interoperability.                          Requirements            Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, Python, or JavaScript.                        Experience with embedded systems and IoT device programming.                        Knowledge of communication protocols and standards used in IoT, such as MQTT, CoAP, and HTTP.                        Familiarity with cloud platforms and IoT platforms like AWS IoT, Azure IoT, or Google Cloud IoT.                        Understanding of data storage, databases, and data management in IoT applications.                        Security knowledge to implement secure communication and protect IoT devices and data.                        Experience with data analytics tools and visualization libraries for IoT data analysis.                        Familiarity with edge computing concepts and implementation.                        Problem-solving and analytical skills to address complex IoT challenges.
column11: IT services, SAN, C++, Data analysis, Data management, Javascript, SMS, HTTP, CRM, Python

column1: Zero trust OT, IoT and edge
column2: Simple, secure IoT management and networking          Connect anything to anything, without VPNs or bastions. Gain strong security against ransomware, data exfiltration, DDoS and botnets. Built for IoT and available in self-hosted and managed options (with hosted network fabrics):          Simple    IoT management and networking            Like being on the IoT device, locally. SSH and RDP natively supported. Low latency, smooth console sessions. Snappy database queries.          Single solution for IoT management and networking. including agentless, Nvidia Jetson, Raspberry Pi, OpenWRT, servers and clouds.          Close all inbound firewall ports. Eliminate dependencies on static public IPs and port forwarding. All sessions authenticated in the background via X.509s. Eliminate VPNs and bastions.              Secure    IoT management and networking          Built-in X.509 certificate authentication to private IoT network overlay with botnet and DDoS protection.          No open inbound firewall ports to minimize the attack surface, with microsegmentation to help protect against data exfiltration.          Mutual TLS (mTLS), encryption and least privileged access. Learn more about the .          Low latency    IoT management and networking          Route each session to its individual destination, directly from the device. Eliminate VPN backhaul, which also reduces cloud egress costs and unnecessary hops.          Low latency. Full mesh, multipoint networking with automatic dynamic routing to use the best connections across multiple tier one networks for each session.          The zero trust network overlay security model enables use of any network so networks with the best latency, bandwidth and throughput are securely used (even WiFi).              Flexible    IoT management and networking          Software-only and cloud orchestrated, with open source and SaaS options (includes managed IoT network overlay).          for any app (SDK-embedded), device, edge or cloud.          Use public cellular (eliminate private APN) and WiFi. 3rd parties enable your IoT devices on their networks because the architecture secures their networks.          Low cost, high velocity    IoT management and networking          Software-only solution eliminates extra security and networking hardware, VPNs, bastions.          Deploy in minutes, across any set of edges and clouds.          Use public cellular (eliminate private APN) and WiFi to reduce costs and accelerate deployments. Customers and partners enable your IoT devices on their networks because your security model secures their networks.
column11: MPLS VPN, WAN, VPN, SSH, SDK, Open source, WiFi, IPS, MPLS, Firewall

column2: Join us as a Technical Support Engineer at Qlik, where you'll be more than a troubleshooter you'll be a HERO. Our collaborative global team, spanning APAC, Spain, Sweden, Australia, Japan, USA, and India, is on the lookout for a resilient individual passionate about analytics and technology, ready to provide exceptional support to our      global      customers.         We operate 24x7 which involves working during one of the below shifts determined as per business need and have a non-standard work week (Ex: Tue - Sat, Wed - Sun). While we have 5 days a work week, your weekly offs may fall on any day of the week depending on the shift rosters that are prepared on a two-month basis.              Work hours are subject to change depending on Business needs. Currently night shifts are for 1 day every weekend     .                     What makes this role interesting                     Strategic Impact:      Drive the future of Qliks technical support by contributing directly to the development and improvement of our global support processes, elevating your role beyond day-to-day responsibilities.         Global Collaboration:      Collaborate with a diverse team of support professionals across the      global     region, fostering a global community where your insights contribute to the success of our larger support network.         Continuous Learning:      Immerse yourself in a dynamic and ever-evolving enterprise software environment, ensuring your passion for analytics and technology aligns with ongoing learning and growth opportunities.             Here's how you'll be making an impact:             Customer-Centric Support:      Engage with customers through calls, live chats, and ticket-based support, ensuring timely troubleshooting and issue resolution.         Proactive Communication:      Keep customers informed about the status of their tickets, actively understanding their current situation, needs, and desired outcomes.         World-Class Experience:      Deliver satisfaction in every case, interact with customers to comprehend their challenges, and provide effective workarounds and technical solutions. Ability to methodically approach and solve technical      problems         Excellent inter-personal skills         Self-motivated to continuously learn new      technologies         6-8 years of      hands-on      experience in three or more areas listed below with primary mandatory experience in Hadoop administration and support.         BigData     :     Solid Hadoop fundamentals, preferred hands-on CDH/CDP implementation. Strong experience in Hadoop administration and support.         Linux:     Seasoned on the command line; comfortable with built-in tools like top,      iostat     ,      lsof     , and netstat.         ETL: Has strong conceptual understanding of Data Warehousing and ETL, Data Governance and Security, Cloud Computing, and Batch & Real Time data processing.         Database:     You have good working knowledge of ONE or any of the following or RDBMS: Oracle, SQL Server, DB2, Teradata, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB         JAVA: Ability to read and understand advanced level Java/ C++ (any programming language) and solid experience in reading and analyzing Java stack traces and exceptions.         Debugging JAVA/JVM issues, Classes, Interfaces, Java Heap performance tuning and optimizing Garbage Collection. Knowledge of analyzing Heap dump and Thread dump is a plus. column2: We are seeking a talented Backend Developer who has handled high-scaled projects and has a strong understanding of software design principles, algorithms, and data structures to join our team.      As a Backend Developer, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining the backend infrastructure and functionality of our conversational commerce platform.      You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers, data analysts, testers, and product managers, to deliver seamless conversational experiences to our users.         Responsibilities:         Design, develop, and maintain our conversational commerce platforms backend systems and APIs, ensuring scalability, security, and high performance.     Collaborate with front-end developers, data analysts, and testers to develop robust features.     Implement and optimize APIs for seamless integration with external systems, including payment gateways, inventory management systems, and customer databases.     Ensure efficient and reliable data storage and retrieval by working with databases, both SQL and NoSQL and implementing effective data models and caching mechanisms.     Implement authentication, authorization, and API security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.     Collaborate with the product team to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions     Conduct code reviews, perform unit testing, and ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.     Troubleshoot and resolve backend issues, working closely with the team to identify and implement solutions on time.     Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in conversational AI technologies, e-commerce, and backend development practices, and apply that knowledge to drive innovation and improvement in our platform.             Requirements:         Education: Masters / Bachelors degree in Computer Science or IT, or equivalent experience.             Required Skills:           Backend Development:    Strong proficiency and 5+ years of experience in backend Python programming language. You should be comfortable building and maintaining server-side applications and handling APIs, databases, and web services. You should have worked on at least one high-level Python web framework.           Web Technologies:    Understanding of web development technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This knowledge is essential for building web-based interfaces.           API Development and Integration:    Experience in designing, developing, and integrating APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) is crucial. You need to be familiar with RESTful principles and have knowledge of tools like Swagger or Postman. Additionally, proficiency in documenting APIs effectively to provide clear and comprehensive documentation for developers who consume your APIs. Experience with APIGEE to monitor API performance, resolve issues, and track usage is good to have.           Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (NLP):    Exposure to Machine learning and familiarity with NLP libraries and frameworks would be beneficial.           Chatbot Development:    Familiarity with conversational technologies and frameworks such as Dialog Flow, Microsoft Bot Framework, or IBM Watson would be beneficial.           Database Management:    Proficiency in working with databases, both SQL and NoSQL especially Google Datastore and Google BigQuery is a must. You should be comfortable with data modeling, writing complex queries, and optimizing database performance. Working knowledge of in-memory data structure Redis is good to have.           Cloud Computing:    Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) especially with services like Cloud Run, Cloud Functions, Logs Explorer, App Engine, Firebase, Data Store, BigQuery, Cloud SQL, and Cloud Storage is a must . You should be able to deploy and scale your applications, manage serverless functions, and work with cloud-based services. Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools like    Terraform    or CloudFormation and implementing DevOps practices for cloud infrastructure is desired.           Security and Authentication:    Understanding of authentication protocols (OAuth, JWT) and secure coding practices. Awareness of potential security vulnerabilities and implementing appropriate security measures to protect user data. Additionally, understanding API security principles and implementing secure practices to protect the API endpoints from unauthorized access, data breaches, and other security threats.           Version Control:    Proficiency in using version control systems like Git is essential for collaborative development and managing code repositories. Familiarity with Git workflows and branching strategies is beneficial. Experience with continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) pipelines using DevOps tools (eg, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD) is desired.           Agile Development:    Familiarity with agile development methodologies, such as Scrum or Kanban, and experience working in agile teams. Knowledge of tools like Confluence and Jira for project management, task tracking, and collaboration.           Problem-Solving and Troubleshooting:    Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently. Debugging, testing, and optimizing code for performance are critical aspects of the role.           Communication Skills:    Excellent communication skills and the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.           Industry Experience:    Familiarity with the specific challenges, trends, and requirements of the conversational commerce industry or e-commerce domain. Previous experience in transactional payments or the e-commerce industry and the integration of conversational interfaces into e-commerce platforms, payments, or applications would be preferred

column2: As a Salesforce AI Consultant , you will be responsible for designing and implementing AI-driven solutions within the Salesforce platform. You will collaborate closely with clients to understand their business needs and identify opportunities for leveraging AI to enhance their Salesforce implementations. You will work with cross-functional teams including developers, data scientists, and business analysts to deliver customized AI solutions that address our clients unique challenges and goals.       ?       Responsibilities:         Collaborate with clients to understand their business objectives and identify opportunities for leveraging AI within their Salesforce implementations.       Design and implement AI-driven solutions using Salesforce Einstein and other AI technologies.       Develop custom AI models and algorithms to solve specific business problems.       Configure and integrate AI-powered features such as predictive lead scoring, recommendation engines, and sentiment analysis into Salesforce applications.       Work closely with developers to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions with existing Salesforce workflows and processes.       Provide guidance and best practices to clients on how to maximize the value of AI within their Salesforce implementations.       Stay updated on the latest AI technologies and trends, and incorporate them into our solutions.
